Title: Stop New Muslim Sister from being homeless!
Description: Salaam.     I’m currently in a serious situation  I embraced islam a number of years ago  I have one young child and If I don’t raise enough money for rented accommodation I may well become homeless. I hate asking for money but this is my last resort. May Allah reward you for your support and make it a means for you to enter Firdous  ameen.

Title: Area 260 fundraiser 4 Calderwood House
Description: Our mission is to provide an innovative solution to homelessness and unemployment in Copeland. Our team provides round the clock support to our residents. We work closely with Copeland Council to support the “Everybody In” campaign and to strive for zero homelessness in the area. There are particular challenges for ex-military personnel who can struggle to adjust to civilian life  so we also prioritise access for them.

Title: Climbing The 3 Peaks - VCS FC
Location: Central Drawing Office Services (Yorkshire) Ltd, Yorkshire and the Humber, United Kingdom
Description: Josh & the VCS United FC - football team are decending onto the 3 peaks in 3 weeks time - to help us carry on the vital work we do - we could do with your help !!!     Vulnerable Citizen Support C.I.C - assist with the most vulnerable & destitute people in society we help with housing - emergency accommodation - mental health calls - food parcels & much more.....     Recently we have helped many people find a home & that's only been with the help of people like you - who are reading this - ❤️   We have been supporting a young female for around 3/4 months - supporting her with hotel costs to save her from having to go into a hostel ❤️    We have now managed to connect with a landlord in a beautiful area - that's happy to let this young individual live there because we don't have time for LCC to carry out inspections which could take up to 5/6 weeks - which in this time the property will be gone ❤️ We now have confirmation that it's ours if we can raise some funds ❤️    Happy to accept DSS moving forward & happy for who we have moving in - we will also be working with this individual going forward ❤️     We also need help in what we do day to day and anything extra we raise will be spent on the running of VCS - as our day to day expense is quite costly ❤️    Thank you

Title: Helping Local Church Charity & Homelessness
Location: Amersham, South East England, United Kingdom
Description: Merry Christmas to you all!     We are collecting for the most wonderful local charity to us called Restore Hope & Kings Church who provide support and gifts to families. We have enjoyed some amazing fun days (see below) & baby groups over the years and would like to raise some money in gratitude.     Eloise was really moved by a homelessness advert  she wants to give a homeless person a Christmas this year  in the warm and accessing services to hopefully help them off the streets.    We have made a “Christmas single” for you to enjoy  please donate a few pennies to our cause and don’t miss the outtakes!!     ❤️ Sophie  Eloise  Archie & Delilah    P.s please do not share online I’m only sending to close friends and family  thanks for your understanding
